detail_desc: Imitation suede sandals with an ankle strap with an adjustable fastener and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Bolero in a soft cotton pointelle knit with a decorative button at the neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer, gently rounded layer in a cotton weave at the hem.
